update.description:
Try to work around issues with docker cache getting out of date.

before:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=955)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/955/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/955/


after:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=957)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/957/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/957/

The problem is that installing `libignition-physics-dev` doesn't upgrade all the other packages. Installing these other two debs seems to trigger the rest to upgrade, but I'm not sure another way to keep the versions synchronized.
update.title: Add more libignition-physics deps to IGN_GAZEBO_DEPENDENCIES
